title: Got Autofilled ADC
body:
I selected Support / Support for my pick queuing for Normal Draft.  I have autofill protection because I always pick support.  And yet, I somehow ended up as ADC?

Why am I getting autofilled when I have protection?  Why didn't the game just wait 5 more seconds for one of the hundreds of current matches that are trying to autofill people into support?  I'm so confused.

replies.body:
Glad to see you figured out what happened with that autofill. Just like you said, it seems like this was a weird occasion where the order in which you selected your roles ended up not giving you autofill protection =\ . 

if you run into anything else that seems weird with autofill, you can always check [**here **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207267266-New-Champion-Select#h2q1)to see if it's intentional and then report a bug if necessary!
it says autofill is not always on, i play 10-12hrs a day and its constanly on... id rather wait 45 min to get my role then fill every 4 games

Okay, figured out what this is.  There's a very strange workflow involved here:

Set your Primary to Support
Set secondary to Fill
Now change Secondary to Support

This, I assume, swaps around your primary and your secondary, turning your primary into Fill and your secondary into Support.  This results in you having no secondary showing.

I assumed, since I had selected Secondary, that the single icon must be for Support, not Fill.  My b for not checking more carefully, I suppose, but still not the workflow I was expecting.
